Sentencas: This paper presents experimental and numerical studies on the fuel reforming process on an Ni/YSZ catalyst.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical studies on chemically reacting gas flow in the porous structure of a solid oxide fuel cells internal fuel reformer

Sentencas: Nickel is widely known as a catalyst material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical studies on chemically reacting gas flow in the porous structure of a solid oxide fuel cells internal fuel reformer

Sentencas: Because of its prices and catalytic properties, Ni is used in both electrodes and internal reforming reactors.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical studies on chemically reacting gas flow in the porous structure of a solid oxide fuel cells internal fuel reformer

Sentencas: To optimize the reforming reactors, detailed data about the entire reforming process is required.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical studies on chemically reacting gas flow in the porous structure of a solid oxide fuel cells internal fuel reformer

Sentencas: In the present paper kinetics of methane/steam reforming on the Ni/YSZ catalyst was experimentally investigated.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical studies on chemically reacting gas flow in the porous structure of a solid oxide fuel cells internal fuel reformer

Sentencas: Measurements including different thermal boundary conditions, the fuel flow rate and the steam-to-methane ratios were performed.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical studies on chemically reacting gas flow in the porous structure of a solid oxide fuel cells internal fuel reformer

Sentencas: The reforming rate equation derived from experimental data was used in the numerical model to predict synthetic gas composition at the outlet of the reformer.
Titulo: Experimental and numerical studies on chemically reacting gas flow in the porous structure of a solid oxide fuel cells internal fuel reformer
